title: Love Lost
description: Love can come into your life in an instant, and leave just as quickly....Jason Straiz is a New York detective working on a case to bring down a major crime lord. He keeps his life simple. Work. Family. Friends. Until he meets Selene.Selene is a lawyer on a mission. Her goal is to bring down the monster that has been terrorizing her for years. When she meets Jason, the attraction is intense. When Jason comes to her aide after tragedy strikes, he becomes a target. When her case and their relationship collide, will her secrets destroy a future they could have together? Can he handle the truth about her?Can love truly conquer all or is there a limit?
author: Maria DeSouza
